Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Strategy

Class BossFiringStrategy

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Strategy.BossFiringStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
FiringStrategy
public class BossFiringStrategy extends Object implements FiringStrategy
Implements the FiringStrategy interface which defines firing behavior for boss plane.

  • Method Details

    • fire

      public ActiveActorDestructible fire(FighterPlane plane)
      Attempts to fire projectile from FighterPlane if it's instance of Boss It checks if the boss should fire projectile based on BOSS_FIRE_RATE. If boss fires, the projectile is created using the ProjectilesFactory at bossplane's current position.
      Specified by:
      fire in interface FiringStrategy
      Parameters:
      plane - : bossplane from which the projectile is to be fired.
      Returns:
      ActiveActorDestructible which represents the fired projectile, or null if no projectile was fired.
